objects.name: Instructions
objects.string:
Click/touch to add a force toward the cursor/touch.
Press c to Reset scene
Press g mode "Special mode 15+"

events.name: Scene settings - Turn off mouse manipulation and set cannot to fire
Turn on ragdoll - Add all joints
If Enabled - Use mouse to add force to ragdoll towards the mouse pointer.

events.comment: Apply physical force if mouse button down - Fix Torso rotation to avoid spinning.
Once we release the mouse, allow Torso rotation.

events.name: Fire Cannon - This triggers every scene restart. - Apply force to Torso (Cannon) and reset the delay timer so we cannot use the mouse for 1 second.  Don't allow Torso to rotate during Firing!

events.comment: Follow the Torso with the camera.
Once the delay timer has reached 1 second, allow mouse input and Torso rotation.
If ragdoll hits something slow down physics time
If ragdoll not hitting something set physics time back to normal
Use particles to simulate blood splatter, set the angle relative to the torso to give correct splatter.
